settingEditorType.title: Type of editor for the setting.
settingEditorType.description: Set the type of editor to use while editing your settings.

toSkip.title: Additional plugins to skip in settings editor
toSkip.description: List of additional plugin IDs that should not be displayed in the settings editor. These plugins can still be configured programmatically or via overrides.json. Note: Some core plugins like context-menu and main-menu are always hidden and cannot be made visible.
